page.title: 02Gretna History (cont)
page.content: Lovers from the South of the Border quickly took advantage of the { {Scottish }Law and it resulted in a thriving marriage trade being set up at {Gretna Green.} The old village {Gretna Green is now linked with the new{Gretna } township on the west side of the main{ {Glasgow}and {Gretna A74 }road. It was built in 1916 to accommodate thousands of workers engaged in the vast {Gretna Munitions factory.The present population is approximately 3000.{ {Gretna's }population is growing because of the new houses and buildings which have been erected.{As {long as the world loves a lover, {Gretna will find a place in the heart {of the people the world over.
